results.title: A Plan to be safe
results.brief_description: Carla Zekas and her family were spending a hot Summer’s day by the river when the dark clouds first emerged. At that moment, the plan changed from staying cool to being safe.

group.title: Living with disaster: stories and experiences from disasters

group_siblings.title: When a fire comes to you

results.title: Les Yeux Fermes = the Eyes Closed
results.brief_description:
Ivan returns from touring with a theatre company. During the tour one of Ivan’s friend died. Back in Paris, Ivan experiences vision toubles and buys a pair of black glasses. From then on, he starts pretending to be a blind man. His girlfriend Xenie witnesses helplessly the slow march towards madness of a ‘blind’ man whose only markers are noises and memories..

Credits: Director, Joel Santoni ; writer, Jeanne Bronner, Joel Santoni, Claude Breuer ; photography, Pierre-William Glenn ; music, Terry Riley.
Cast: Gerard Desarthe, Lorraine Rainer, Jean Carmet, Marcel Dalio, Lucien Raimbourg.

Please note this film contains mature themes, violence and nudity.

results.title: Aluminium in Australia
results.creator_credit: Lilias Fraser, Norman Castle and Fraser Castle Productions
results.brief_description: This film tells of the mining of bauxite deposits at Weipa in the far north of Australia - the York Peninsula. The product of this vast mining venture is then transported to Tasmania where it is processed into ingots at the Bell Bay Refinery. From ingots through the rolling mills it is processed into suitable form for the making of a variety of finished products for industry, the home and for commercial buildings. The enormous possibilities of the use of this light, versatile twentieth century metal are shown.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lilias Fraser, Norman Castle and Fraser Castle Productions

results.title: Dairying in Australia
results.creator_credit: Lilias Fraser, Norman Castle and Fraser Castle Productions
results.brief_description: Shows scenes of milking, grazing of herds, production of hay, use of silage, production of small crops for farm use, fertilizing of pastures, pasteurization, cheese and butter making and export of dairy products.

results.title: For Tomorrow
results.creator_credit: Norman Castle, Lilias Fraser, Conzinc Riotinto of Australia and Fraser Castle Productions
results.brief_description: Conzinc Riotinto sends geologists to Bougainville to search for minerals. The rugged mountainous jungle country, heat and humidity makes it an arduous task. They establish a drilling site where much sampling, testing and drilling of the area is carried out to evaluate the location.

results.title: Working together
results.creator_credit: Norman Castle, Lilias Fraser and Australian Dairy Board
results.brief_description: South-East Asia is rich in natural resources and food potential is good but an improvement in farming techniques is needed and high protein foods are scarce. Australia, with its highly mechanised dairy industry, can provide aid and personnel in setting up and maintaining jointly-owned factories is such countries as Indonesia, Hong Kong, Singapore, the Philippines and Japan.

results.title: Mining men
results.creator_credit: Lilias Fraser, Norman Castle and Conzinc Riotinto of Australia
results.brief_description: Describes the opportunities available for young men in the mining industry. It outlines the work of the graduate geologist, the mining engineer, the metallurgist and others and gives a comprehensive picture of life and work in new and developing mining communities of Australia.

results.title: Water birds of the inland
results.creator_credit: Norman Castle, Lilias Fraser, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: Shows general feeding and nesting habits of a variety of inland water birds at Narran Lake, Western NSW (also known as Terewah Lake) and its surrounding marshy area.
